original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edge up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares edge up in mid day trade, Colombo Stock Exchange showed.
The main All Share Price Index was up 1.23 percent or 112.89 points to 9,272.42, the most liquid index S&P SL20 was up 1.68 percent or 43.76 points to 2,649.91.
Top gainers during mid day trade were Sampath Bank, Vallible One and Melstacorp. (Colombo/June21/2023)
